Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller

Klasse Controller_main

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller.Controller_main
public class Controller_main extends Object
Controller for the main application view. Manages navigation between different views and handles global application settings.

  • Methodendetails

    • handleDashboard

      private void handleDashboard()
      Handles the action of navigating to the Dashboard view. Triggered when the corresponding button is clicked.

    • handleSettings

      private void handleSettings()
      Handles the action of navigating to the Settings view. Triggered when the corresponding button is clicked.

    • loadView

      private void loadView(String fxmlFile)
      Loads an FXML file and displays it in the contentPane.
      Parameter:
      fxmlFile - Path to the FXML file to be loaded.

    • setProfile

      public void setProfile(Profile profile)
      Sets the profile object that is passed from the start screen. This profile will be used throughout the main view.
      Parameter:
      profile - The Profile object to be set.

    • setWebAPI

      public void setWebAPI(com.jpro.webapi.WebAPI webAPI)
      Sets the WebAPI instance to be used by this controller. This method ensures that the WebAPI is only set once.
      Parameter:
      webAPI - The WebAPI instance to be set.

    • setHostServices

      public void setHostServices(javafx.application.HostServices hostServices)
      Sets the HostServices instance to be used by this controller. This method ensures that the HostServices is only set once.
      Parameter:
      hostServices - The HostServices instance to be set.
